quote: "The overall atmosphere was great, I felt really good there and the venue was super awesome. Definitely the hack talks were great and the demo expo too.“
“The experience of the attending to the biggest hackathon in Europe. I got a paulig mug for free :-). And free slush passes and other Terminal events”
“Having the feeling of "living" together with all these people at the event. It really felt as if we were one big family and I could kinda move in ^^”
“Everything was awesome enough, but the laser... oh man, the laser... Also, the acoustic guitars at the Yousician booth gave our team some fun times.”
“A lot of different activities. I haven't enough time to visit them all, but I had a big variety in what to do. And a lot of cool swag, of course!”
“Great place (Helsinki in general, Wanha Satama as an event home), super cute volunteers, lots of interesting people from all around the globe.”
“I found a nice team with complete strangers and we worked well together!”
“The creative chaos, inspiring technical knowledge and access to learn about tech that I wouldn't normally have the chance to play with.”
“Terminal is the greatest idea I've ever seen on any hackaton. Thank you very much for taking care of participants after the event!”
“Felt closer to the people I worked with. People who I have never met before and will never meet again (different countries).”
“The environment, the atmosphere, the welcome desk and of course the time away from other stuffs to hack something :)”
“Meeting all the people and feeling the excitement! It gave me motivation to push forward as a software developer. “
“The free food and drink was something I didn't expect. It was amazing to always see the snacks stand stocked. “
“Everything. Everything was awesome! (maybe real food could be available hours if possible, but that's okay)”
“creativity, innovation, meeting new people and being amazed how far have we come in field of technology”
“The actual hacking and the people. Especialli after Junction in Terminal ... so many cool new friends.”
“The people and the motivational blast that seeing everybody at high level and doing crazy cool stuff!'”
“To meet people from all around the world and to have the opportunity to develop a project in 48h.”
“Networking with other hackers and companies! Junction really is an awesome place to meet people.”
“As a people person the karaoke for sure, but meeting other professional in IT was pure awesome!”
“The accommodation! I've never seen a hackathon do that. It was super cool for it to happen.”
“The access to 3D-printers was very nice, and allowed us to get a physical product quickly. “
“Hacking, creating something real, community. It was my first hackathon and it was awesome!”
“The production value, the size of the event, the venue, the people! EVERYTHING!”
“Number of participants, amazing ideas, perfect organisation, free accomodation”
“The "it's mostly about having fun" mentality, so beginner felt welcome, too!”
“Night karaoke was awesome, It woke me up and give extra hours for hacking.”
“Playing guitar and wondering around calling with tradition repesentatives”
“The location was amazing. The different areas for each track were great.”
“HackTalks. (And getting to converse with the presenters afterwards.)”
“Learning new programming things. I never knew Jquery is so easy lol”
